result.eng: Of course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ga: ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.orig: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin

result.eng: The pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.
result.ga: bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoil
result.orig: Bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoil

result.ponchtml: ḃí na daltaí ag foġlaim faoi stair an ċine ġoirm le déanaí ar scoilThe pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.

result.eng: February is "Black History Month" in America.
result.ga: is é feabhra mí stair an chine ghoirm i meiriceá
result.orig: Is é Feabhra Mí Stair an Chine Ghoirm i Meiriceá

result.ponchtml: is é feaḃra mí stair an ċine ġoirm i meiriceáFebruary is "Black History Month" in America.

result.eng: From this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ga: as an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.orig: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.html: as an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san eoraip agus sa domhan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ponchtml: as an am seo amaċ b'iad scláḃaiṫe forṁór mór na ndaoine gorma a facṫas san eoraip agus sa doṁan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.

result.eng: It wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ga: níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.orig: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.html: níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ponchtml: níorḃ ḟada gur ṫosaiġ daoine geala ag breaṫnú ar ḋaoine gorma mar ḟo-ċineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.

result.eng: Black people did not have full rights.
result.ga: ní raibh cearta iomlána ag daoine gorma
result.orig: Ní raibh cearta iomlána ag daoine Gorma
result.html: ní raibh cearta iomlána ag daoine gormaBlack people did not have full rights.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ cearta iomlána ag daoine gormaBlack people did not have full rights.

result.eng: In 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.
result.ga: in 1856 rialaigh cúirt uachtarach na stát aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine gorma
result.orig: In 1856 rialaigh Cúirt Uachtarach na Stát Aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine Gorma
result.html: in 1856 rialaigh cúirt uachtarach na stát aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine gormaIn 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.
result.ponchtml: in 1856 rialaiġ cúirt uaċtaraċ na stát aontaiṫe nár ḃain bille cearta na tíre le daoine gormaIn 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.
